author: Kashmira Gander
title: Loss of Taste and Smell as COVID-19 Symptom Should Be Screening Measure for Virus Across the World
description: Common symptoms of the COVID-19 disease include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
content:
People who lose their sense of smell or taste are over 10 times more likely to have the novel coronavirus than another infection, according to a study.
The authors of the paper hope their findings will result in screenings for the virus taking into account t… [+6738 chars]
